attributes.action: A Maxium Time an Unalected Prime Minister can Wait before go to the Polls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create a law that would force a maximum time in office an internally appointed new leader of the Government can wait before they have to seek a mandate from the population. 

It is important that all PM's have the mandate and psychological acceptance of the nation while they govern.

My suggestion for the duration is 6 months minimum after which a general election should be called.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
